description.lang: The devolo Home Control Central Unit is the centrepiece of your smart home. It discreetly ensures that all components of your smart home work with each other without a hitch. The innovative and future-proofed Z-Wave wireless technology comes in handy here; as your devolo Home Control is fully functional on its own in the house, you will never need to worry about losing the Internet connection. Also, additional devolo Home Control components and even components from third-party suppliers can be added at any time. That's how your smart home can grow, individually based on your ideas and needs. Operation works easily by using the free app for smartphones, tablets and computers. Control light, room temperature and much more in interaction with additional components. Highlights:-The easiest smart home solution from the global market leader in Powerline-Greater comfort and convenience, more security, lower energy consumption.-The devolo Home Control convenience promisea smart home in 20 minutes:-1. Quick DIY installation-2. Simple set-up-3. Intuitive operation-Developed and tested in Germany-Secure, stable and reliable using the Z-Wave wireless standard -Open and future-proofed standard (already over 1000 various Z-Wave components available globally)-3-year manufacturers warranty
